key.description: This property is no longer available and will be removed from the documentation soon. See the deprecation notice for details.

accountId.description: The account ID of the user, uniquely identifying the user across all Atlassian products. Required in requests.

accountType.description: The user account type. Possible values are 'atlassian' for regular Atlassian user account, 'app' for a system account used for Connect applications and OAuth, and 'customer' for a Jira Service Desk account representing an external service desk.

name.description: This property is no longer available and will be removed from the documentation soon. See the deprecation notice for details.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the user. Depending on the user's privacy setting, this may be returned as null.

16x16.description: The URL of the item's 16x16 pixel avatar.

24x24.description: The URL of the item's 24x24 pixel avatar.

32x32.description: The URL of the item's 32x32 pixel avatar.

48x48.description: The URL of the item's 48x48 pixel avatar.

displayName.description: The display name of the user. Depending on the user's privacy setting, this may return an alternative value.

active.description: Indicates whether the user is active.

timeZone.description: The time zone specified in the user's profile. Depending on the user's privacy setting, this may be returned as null.

locale.description: The locale of the user. Depending on the user's privacy setting, this may be returned as null.

groups.description: The groups that the user belongs to.

self.description: The URL for these group details.

applicationRoles.description: The application roles assigned to the user.

key.description: The key of the application role.

groups.description: The groups associated with the application role.

name.description: The display name of the application role.

defaultGroups.description: The groups granted default access for this application role.

selectedByDefault.description: Determines whether this application role should be selected by default on user creation.

numberOfSeats.description: The maximum count of users on your license.

remainingSeats.description: The count of users remaining on your license.

userCount.description: The number of users counting against your license.

userCountDescription.description: The type of users being counted against your license.

platform.description: Indicates if the application role belongs to Jira platform ('jira-core').

expand.description: Expand options that include additional user details in the response.

description:
A user with details as permitted by the user's Atlassian Account privacy settings. However, be aware of these exceptions:

 *  User record deleted from Atlassian: This occurs as the result of a right to be forgotten request. In this case, `displayName` provides an indication and other parameters have default values or are blank (for example, email is blank).
 *  User record corrupted: This occurs as a results of events such as a server import and can only happen to deleted users. In this case, `accountId` returns *unknown* and all other parameters have fallback values.
 *  User record unavailable: This usually occurs due to an internal service outage. In this case, all parameters have fallback values.
